Title: Exempts schools, student organizations, and certain other entities from sales taxes on certain prepared foods sold
Summary: Exempts schools, school districts, student organizations, non-profit organizations, and not-for-profit organizations from sales taxes on prepared foods where total revenues from sales are below two hundred fifty dollars.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to exempting schools, student organizations, and certain other entities from sales taxes on certain prepared foods sold
